result.title: Third selection round of WCC-2017
result.content:
Meanwhile, this Sunday will see the third selection round for Winter Computer Camp. It will be held in December 18 at 15:30 (3:30pm) GMT+3. In order to receive a login, password and link to the round, you need to register. They are distributed in several steps per day, within several hours before the beginning of a round.

This year's Winter Computer Camp will be held at MIPT from February 27 to March 8, 2017.

The programme features:

  • Daily study contests: preparation to the Finals of the Open Olympiad, Technocup, National Olympiads in Programming;

  • Thematic lectures. This year each participant can compose their own curriculum out of a set of lectures;

  • Lectures by employees of MIPT base organizations on real tasks in the IT industry and professional scientists on combinatorial mathematics;

  • Sports and intellectual games.

More information can be found on the website: http://it-edu.mipt.ru/en/zksh2017
